tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT,
  reporter_name VARCHAR (255),
  status VARCHAR (50)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceInvestigations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id UUID,
  investigator_name VARCHAR (255),
  investigation_date TIMESTAMP,
  findings TEXT,
  corrective_actions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_title VARCHAR(255),
    report_description TEXT,
    date_reported TIMESTAMP,
    reported_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceInvestigations (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(150),
    investigation_date DATE,
    findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investigation_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_details TEXT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ReportComments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(100),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE InvestigatorNotes (
    note_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(100),
    note_text TEXT,
    note_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE incident_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(50),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);
